column5: I'm looking for a ram mount for my lowrance mark 5 dsi.  Anyone know of any retailers in gta that might carry?
Radioworld has a wide selection.  Jb fishing depot has them.  Bps has them.  Lebaron has a couple.  Sail has some.

I ordered mine from Alberta, can't remember the companies name though... But they were a lot cheaper then I found in stores and had a huge selection  Edit to add, I purchased mine from gpscity.ca I found them cheaper including shipping at the time. And you can buy the piece to build the mount u want
I bought mine directly from RAM online, worked fine for me. I've also heard of gpscity.ca and apparently they're good and ship quickly.
